criteria: Accuracy in finding 10 more or 10 less than a given two-digit number mentally.
Clarity and correctness of the explanation of the reasoning used.
descriptions: Unable to find 10 more or 10 less than the given number and relies on counting.
Incorrectly finds 10 more or 10 less than the given number most of the time and struggles with mental calculation.
Sometimes finds 10 more or 10 less than the given number mentally, but makes frequent errors.
Usually finds 10 more or 10 less than the given number mentally with occasional errors.
Accurately finds 10 more or 10 less than the given number mentally most of the time.
Consistently and accurately finds 10 more or 10 less than the given number mentally without any errors.
Unable to explain the reasoning used or provides an explanation that is unclear and incorrect.
Provides a vague explanation of the reasoning, but it is difficult to understand and contains inaccuracies.
Attempts to explain the reasoning, but the explanation lacks clarity and may contain some errors.
Explains the reasoning used with some clarity, but may have minor gaps in understanding.
Clearly explains the reasoning used with a good understanding of place value and properties of operations.
Clearly, concisely, and correctly explains the reasoning used, demonstrating a thorough understanding of place value and properties of operations.
